I want to learn about animals. Which animal do you like most? > cat
Welcome to the animal expert system!
What do you want to do:
1. Play the guessing game 2. List of all animals 3. Search for an animal 4. Calculate statistics 5. Print the Knowledge Tree 0. Exit > 1 Playing the guessing game. You think of an animal, and I guess it. Press enter when you're ready. > Is it a cat? > no I give up. What animal do you have in mind? > dog Specify a fact that distinguishes a cat from a dog. The sentence should satisfy one of the following templates: - It can ... - It has ... - It is a/an ...
> It can climbs tree Is the statement correct for a dog? > No I have learned the following facts about animals: - The cat can climbs tree. - The dog can't climbs tree. I can distinguish these animals by asking the question: - Can it climbs tree? Nice! I've learned so much about animals!
Would you like to play again? > Yes You think of an animal, and I guess it. Press enter when you're ready. > Can it climbs tree? > Yes Is it a cat? > No I give up. What animal do you have in mind? > a lynx Specify a fact that distinguishes a cat from a lynx. The sentence should satisfy one of the following templates: - It can ... - It has ... - It is a/an ...
> It is living in the forest Is the statement correct for a lynx? > yes I have learned the following facts about animals: - The cat isn't living in the forest. - The lynx is living in the forest. I can distinguish these animals by asking the question: - Is it living in the forest? Nice! I've learned so much about animals!
Would you like to play again? > no What do you want to do:
1. Play the guessing game 2. List of all animals 3. Search for an animal 4. Calculate statistics 5. Print the Knowledge Tree 0. Exit > 0 Have a nice day! Good afternoon!
